import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {Form,Row, Col, Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import './CreatePage.css'; class CreatePage extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleInputChange = this.props.handleInputChange; this.handleSubmit = this.props.handleSubmit; } createOptinos = () => this.state.typeList.length ? this.state.typeList.map(data => ) : ""; render() { return (

); } } export default CreatePage;
